body:
Hi again fellow Avicus members. I am here to shair a friend of mines YouTube Channel. WestTidePvP's YouTube channel to be exact. Here is the link to his YouTube channel. He only just begun and is uploading montages all Avicus (well, most of it is.) Subscribe if you enjoy the content from WestTidePvP

Link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO8-2a4IuNSZe1zN8PSPPUQ
